entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory uses backslashes (\) for directory seperation, even on Linux #98247
  • Announcement: BinaryFormatter is being removed in .NET 9 #98245
    9.0.0
  • Bug in XsdDataContractImporter when importing ComplexType #98240
  • D decompression handler is case-sensitive #98236
  • Configuration binding ignores ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration and throws #98231
    Future
  • JIT: missing opportunity for Redundant Branch Opt #98227
    Future
  • Question/request for documentation on .NET WASM runtime env vars #98225
  • HTTP/3 stress test has occasional QuicException #98220
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskAwaitPendingResult #98219
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] RangeError: Invalid typed array length #98217
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ThreadingTimer #98216
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Chrome test failure `DebuggerTests.SteppingTests.SteppingIntoLibrarySymbolsLoadedFromSymbolServerRemoveSymbolServerAndStepAgain` #98215
  • [browser][MT] enable worker threads in sgen GC #98214
    9.0.0
  • [infra] Mono runs only a Xunit subset of runtime tests #98213
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Makefile for runtime build is broken #98210
  • .NET 9 per-preview performance overview #98209
    9.0.0
  • Test duration reported by `dotnet test` is inaccurate for xUnit async tests #98205
  • double.Cos and double.SinCos can produce very different results #98204
  • [browser][MT] HttpClientCancelTest.SendAsync_Cancel_Success #98201
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for lazy evalution of message and args parameters in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.LoggerExtensions to improve performance #98200
    Future

Closed

  • Test failure: HandleRefTest.Validate_NoGC() #97334
  • HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT has invalid value on custom .NET runtime host on Linux #97086
    8.0.x
  • `Math.Round[F](x, MidpointRounding)` doesn't use `VROUNDS[SD]` outside of "to even" #98164
  • [API Proposal]: An official way to determine whether the given value is JIT-time constant or not #98153
  • [API Proposal]:Replace method CountBy #98169
  • [mono] Remove framework-specific code and unnecessary MonoDomain usage #45034
    Future
  • Memory stolen from sql server when using CLR SQLDataReader #98181
  • Ambiguous constructors exception #98228
  • Blazor Wasm dotnet 8 preview 6 doesn't work on chrome android phone #89028
    8.0.0
  • ARM64: redundant overflow and divbyzero checks #98100
    9.0.0
  • AOT compilation to publish program the code from the dependency libraries cannot be included in the DLL #96036
  • Random "dummy" file in repository #98161
  • [browser] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests - abort early #97518
    9.0.0
  • [browser] GC - Assertion: should not be reached - simple_nursery_serial_scan_object #97543
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] various WebWorkerTest CI failures #96628
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Let me define serialisation strings for enum values with AOT #98188
  • Consider splitting up `System.Text.Json` tests to allow running them completely with wasm/AOT #87078
    Future
  • Compiling Wasm AOT breaks when using protobuf-net 2.x as a dependency #70444
    9.0.0
  • InvalidCastException thrown after TimerQueueTimer.CallCallback #81211
    7.0.x
  • Avoid bundling unnecessary functionality in the wasm published output #48225
    Future
  • [wasm] Experiment with getting rid of SHA1Transform in the runtime #43693
    Future
  • [mono][gc] Objects larger than LOS section size call the LOS heap to grow without bound #97991

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] pinvoke improvements part 2 #98250
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix polluted CompareState when comparing element types in a signature #98249
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FR_2A, GB_2A, FV_2A, FY_3A #98248
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [release/6.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98246
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • [release/7.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98244
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • JIT: Add FlowEdge destination block member #98243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #98241
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Add ca-certificates to Mariner 2.0 deps #98239
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove C FILE PAL wrappers #98238
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: a bunch of peepholes for AND and OR operations #98237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Using dotnet 9's save assembly api for debugging DI IL emit #98234
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Pass the minimum macOS version to the linker #98233
    os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Simplify method_needs_stack_walk (). #98230
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix gc-related bugs in risc-v emitter #98226
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "[browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null " #98221
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Workaround an MSVC bug with __libm_sse2_sincos_ #98207
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fast FieldInfo reflection #98199
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance

Merged

  • Disable `Validate_NoGC()` test under GCStress #98242
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop trying to format HOST_RUNTIME_CONTRACT property with locale settings #97891
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 8.0.3
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][jit] Fix passing of byref arguments in m… #97850
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.3
  • Fix polluted CompareState when comparing element types in a signature #98198
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Temporarily disable failing assertions triggered by the FastReducer implementation. #98212
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Simplify and optimize Math(F).Round #98186
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Set naive likelihoods when initializing preds #98192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Move a lock to protect m_pDynamicStaticsInfo #97352
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] Handle open types to appear in interface maps #98182
    Servicing-approved, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97650
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #97188
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • Use VectorXx.Indices in several places #98203
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][jit] Add minimal support for unsupported avx instruction sets. #98151
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Delete random "dummy" file #98179
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ARM64: Optimize overflow and divbyzero checks with assertions #98113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Delete `RhCorElementTypeInfo` #98144
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Use faster unchecked write-barrier for boxed statics #98166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix a windows build issue. #98206
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Update SqlClient and ship Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility #97883
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.17
  • [mono][jit] More SIMD cleanups #97958
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing for more sizes. #97860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix decode_value_compute_size #97568
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.3
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97871
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.3
  • Fix intermediate runtime dependency #98202
    needs-area-label
  • [mono][sgen] Prevent concurrent sweep from blocking major collections #98154
    area-GC-mono
  • Propagate installers in runtime output in VMR build #98104
    needs-area-label

Updated

  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_GP_3A` to `SVE_HV_4A` #98141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove CoreCLR math.h CRT PAL Redefines #98048
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Sin/Cos #98194
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Remove C-String PAL wrappers #98189
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Manually depad RSAES-PKCS1 on Apple OSes #97738
    area-System.Security, os-mac-os-x, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add FK_3{A,B,C}, EJ_3A, EK_3A, EY_3B, EW_3{A,B} #98187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • This is an incomplete implementation of a new randomized allocation s… #98167
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Send connection WINDOW_UPDATE before RTT PING #97881
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Canonicalize loop exits #98096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix constant folding for arm64 MultiplyByScalar operations involving Vector2.One #98150
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98066
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.3
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono] Intrinsify multiple LoadVector API's #98077
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Update ceeload.cpp #98197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • [infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Do not use AllocHGlobal in Pkcs12Reader #97447
    area-System.Security
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Optimize equality operators #98196
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Fix Windows implementation of NegotiateAuthenticationPal.GetMIC #98031
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Do not throw in AssemblyExtensions.TryGetRawMetadata. #96370
    area-System.Reflection, runtime-mono, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [CI][browser] Limit parallelism for browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_AOT to fix hanging CI #97992
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Optimize always-throwing functions and cctors for size #2513
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Add initial documentation for the projection tooling #2512
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial precise LSSA implementation #2510
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet test` do not respect MSBUILDTERMINALLOGGER='auto' env variable. #38654
  • Can't install maui workload on Mac #38653
  • DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT through csproj #38646
  • Display appropriate error message when providing syntactically incorrect MSBUILD flags to dotnet pack #38645

Closed

  • `dotnet list {SolutionName}.sln package` fails #38647
  • PackageInstall.Tests timeout known build error #36192

PullRequests

Merged

  • FabricBot: Onboarding to GitOps.ResourceManagement because of FabricBot decommissioning #38507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • backport: Verbosity Options default to minimal from quiet in tool install #38612
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Fix runtime dependency name #38656
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't require AppHost when publishing AOT #38644
    Area-External, untriaged

Updated

  • Add design proposal for workload history #30486
  • Fix links in .gitignore #30066
    Area-Infrastructure
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Open issues: Breaking changes #7918
  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add new open question around params mismatches in overrides #7926

Updated

  • Meetings 2024 Feb/March #7920

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regular occurrence of `Feature 'Rename' is currently unavailable` error #72036
  • Regular occurrence of `ReplaceMethodWithPropertyCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72035
  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpIntroduceParameterCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72034
  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpConvertToRecordRefactoringProvider` error #72032
  • "Show potential fixes" does not offer a simple namespace fix #72022
  • Failed assert at AbstractSymbolDisplayService.AbstractSymbolDescriptionBuilder.GetSemanticModel #72020
  • CSharpGoToGlobalImportsTests is flakey #72018
  • Inline Rename currentState is null #72017
  • Unnecessary defensive copies on enums passed by `in` #72016
  • MSBuildWorkspace does not cleanly load blazorwasm project #72015
  • MSBuildWorkspace does not cleanly load VB project on Linux or MacOS #72014

Closed

  • Code analysis generates exceptions non-stop #72024
  • Regular occurrence of `CSharpImplementImplicitlyCodeRefactoringProvider` error #72033
  • The problem with gRPC services #71947
  • VS coloring not working fine after commenting code #72030
  • Roslyn inlay hints provider needs to disable itself when the C# LSP editor is active #72023
  • `GenerateMethodCodeFixProvider` encountered an error and has been disabled #72025
  • [Regression] False positive in nullable analysis of local functions #71419
    17.10
  • Incomplete switch expression with a "case" makes Visual Studio report over ~40+ warnings #71957

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash in 'replace method with property' when references are in generated parts. #72039
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add argument check to help track down a crash #72038
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix crash with convert to record #72037
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add compilation start / stop ETW events #72031
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix crash in 'convert interface impl to implicit/explicit'. #72027
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make getting a frozen partial snapshot async. #72026
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the AllSyntaxTreesParsed compilation tracker state. #72021
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix null ref in convert-local-function #72029
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. #71976
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Build bootstrap compiler in separate phase #72001
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'remove unreachable code' #72028
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Params parameters are implicitly scoped when their type is a ref struct. #72000
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Reduce allocations in AbstractFormatEngine.Format #72002
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix some comments in the Workspaces.MSBuild project file #71981
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only request the necessary document and project in GraphBuilder.PopulateMapsForFileInputNode #71977
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Inline hints - do not produce tags if using lsp editor #71985
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add missing dependencies #72013
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Disable flakey test #72019
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Break out the IsFrozen flag to be an aspect of CompilationTrackerState. (first commit) #71986
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove hte NoCompilationState singleton, and use 'null' for it instead. #71996
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Modify CpsDiagnosticItemSourceProvider.CreateCollectionSource to be resilient to being passed a disposed hierarchy item. #71991
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce dictionary resizes under NodeMapBuilder.AddToMap #71995
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in ImmutableArrayExtensions.GetTypesFromMemberMap #72003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix invariant-breaking parsing of errant case clauses in switch expressions #71960
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify instantiation of lsp options #72009
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Cache frozen partial solution snapshots acquired off of a solution instance #71999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support code folding for argument lists #71064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined conversions #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Implement control flow graph for Lock object feature #71987
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add async operation listener to allow integration tests to wait for server side operations #70359
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #53927
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #53926
  • Controls are not working properly in.NET 8.0 Web App Per Page (interactive location) template layout pages. #53925
  • Issue using @microsoft/signalr with Azure Serverless in a DenoJS backend #53923
  • RegisterCustomElement stopped working in Blazor 8 #53920
  • launchSettings.json ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT should not be overridden by environment variable #53916
  • .NET Blazor - two way data binding with handler method in parent component issue #53914
  • Perf regression: plaintext #53913
  • Perf improvement: mvc #53911
  • a second operation was started on this context #53910

Closed

  • Error boundaries may block redirects by handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #52777
    8.0.x
  • BlazorWasm benchmark broken (docker version) #53033
    9.0-preview2
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json, json #53912
  • Constructor injection for Blazor components #18088
    9.0-preview2
  • RAM problems when downloading files #40658
    Backlog
  • BlazorWasm benchmark failing #49713
    9.0-preview2
  • Blazor Inputs can't bind to variables that start with ÅÄÖ when upgrading to .net 8 #53891
    8.0.x
  • PageTitle does not work with disabled prerendering and render mode InteractiveWebAssembly #53917
  • Multiple 401 when using Windows authentication on HTTP.sys #13634
    Backlog
  • POST operation in Production environment: System.InvalidOperationException: The SPA default page middleware could not return the default page '/index.html' #34420
    .NET 9 Planning
  • JWT token silent renew breaks and causes crash on React template with authentication #17962
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor 'System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException' on .NET 8 #52755
    8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Public API changes to enable compression on Interactive components for Blazor Web #53821
  • Perf regression: json #53876
  • SignalR calls not working #53903
  • http client is very slow ib blazor .net 8 #53643
  • Blazor component AuthorizeView can accept the AuthorizationPolicy combine function result. #52920
  • There is a problem with transmitting and receiving url routing parameters #53683
  • Blazor Server Rendering does not work on iPhones with a version lower than 17.3 #53663

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix hot reload memory leak #53928
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • PathString.StartsWithSegments: Clarify trailing slash behavior in doc comments #53924
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `4872968` to `b75ecf1` #53918
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • [Blazor] Prevent error boundaries from handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #53826
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #53749
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview2
  • Update Node.js version in Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks #53921
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • Add unit test to confirm change token is disposed during #53827
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Constructor injection #53915
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53874
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2
  • [Blazor] Websocket compression API review feedback #53835
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Makes RemoteAuthenticationContext serialize correctly #53819
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Pass the member info directly #53892
    area-blazor, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • `System.OutOfMemoryException` during installation `dotnet-sos`, `dotnet-symbol`, `dotnet-dump` for `linux-riscv64` #4495
  • How to debug memory leak that is not clear on dotnet-dump? #4139
    8.0.0
  • `dotnet-trace` speedscope report: the call of one method is divided into different pieces #4490
    9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Testing] Surface testing failures better so we can differentiate between tests and infrastructure. #20483

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentException thrown when building queries involving owned entities mapped with .ToJson() #33046
  • Use inheritance instead of annotations for TableExpressionBase (specifically temporal tables) #33044
  • DbSet.Add causes failure if called after lazy loading related entity #33041
  • EF Core 8.0.1 regression: an entity with a primary key in another collation returns invalid results for trivial queries. #33040
  • Migrations: when adding required column with custom converter and unspecified default value to existing table, we don't pass through converter to generate the default "empty" value #33038
  • Owned type's shadow key size should match that of owner's PK #33037
  • Performance implications of Projections which result in unnecessary casts #33036
  • I need a setting or option to store all the enums as string in database including the enum columns or enums inside the json columns (even if they are at root of the json or multi level in depth due to complexity of json) #33035

Closed

  • EF Core 8.0.1 query with where Contains ( xx in zzzz) create error SqlException (0x80131904): #33045
  • Stack Overflow Error in .NET 8.0 in EF Core with Large Table #32971
    9.0.0-preview1
  • An issue with query filtering and aggregation, after upgrading from 6.0.0 to 6.0.16 #33001
  • ValueConverters do not detect changes when using ChangeTrackingProxies / ChangedAndChangingNotifications #32992

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33047
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33039

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update SqlClient dependency #33043
    tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Update SqlClient dependency #33042
    tell-mode, 7.0.17

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.4xx] Update to latest WiX version #18607
  • Update to latest WiX version #18606

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Update WiX to latest release #18604

  • [release/7.0.4xx] Update WiX to latest release #18602
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update WiX to latest release #18601
  • Update WiX to latest release #18599
  • Revert "Disables test-templates build again" #18597
  • Put artifacts in well-known locations #18591
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #18588
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #18587

Merged

  • Enable building WPF in the unified build #18577
  • Stop running vmr-scan in public CI #18608
  • Merge runtime patches #18598
  • Update DotNetBuildSkipTests -> DotNetBuildTests #18583
  • Fail more steps if a command fails in vmr-build.yml #18595
  • Run stages in parallel in vmr-build.yml #18594
  • Fix intermediate runtime dependency #18586
  • Remove runtime patch that is missing in VMR #18582
  • Set default value for container parameter in vmr-build.yml #18590
  • Disables test-templates build again #18592
  • Enable test-templates build #18581
  • Remove dead code #18579
  • [VMR] Add basic WASM CI #18573
  • Enable roslyn-analyzers #18585
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #18542
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #18538

Updated

  • Installer updates (Merge to SDK Changeset) #17959
  • remove .net framework containizerization assets when building non-Windows SDKs #16764
  • Hardcode netcoreapp2.1 test templates version #14349
  • Add support for removing binaries #18541
  • Add PackageDiff tool and task #18580
  • Remove cloaked binaries #18563
